Name: Leonora
description:
Leonora is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Leonora has a buy-and-sell RTW business in the Philippines. She requested a 13,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase clothes to sell.

Leonora has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.
